docs.lead_paragraph: I received an email this morning from a young woman named Emmie, who is looking for advice. She is 22 years old, single and pregnant, and trying to decide what to do next.

headline.main: Young, Single and Pregnant — What Now?

docs.abstract: Emmie is 22-years-old, single and pregnant, and trying to decide what to do next.
docs.snippet: Emmie is 22-years-old, single and pregnant, and trying to decide what to do next.

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. George R. Tiller’s clinic in Wichita will remain closed, his family said. It was one of the few in the country to provide abortions to women late in their pregnancies.

headline.main: Kansas Abortion Clinic Operated by Doctor Who Was Killed Closes Permanently
headline.print_headline: Kansas Abortion Clinic Operated by Doctor Who Was Killed Closes Permanently

docs.snippet: Dr. George R. Tiller’s clinic in Wichita will remain closed, his family said. It was one of the few in the country to provide abortions to women late in their pregnancies.

docs.lead_paragraph: 8 P.M. (HBO2) LETTERS TO THE PRESIDENT (2009) Two days before the Iranian presidential election, which takes place on Friday, HBO2 presents the first of three documentaries focusing on that country. This film by Petr Lom, who has a Ph.D. in political philosophy from Harvard, captures Iranians' impressions of President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, above, as he travels the countryside and encourages citizens to write him letters telling of their misfortunes. According to a member of the president's staff, he has received about 10 million letters and has responded to three-quarters of them -- a figure the film claims is propaganda. Mr. Lom visits the Presidential Letter Processing Center in Tehran, where the letters are read by Basiji students, members of a religious paramilitary group. 7 A.M. (NBC) TODAY Topics include getting a job, do-it-yourself weddings and life after cancer. Martha Stewart and M C Hammer are guests. Charlie Todd of Improv Everywhere discusses his new book, ''Causing a Scene.''

docs.lead_paragraph: How to renew the search for common ground in America’s most contentious debate.

docs.lead_paragraph: The shooting of a doctor in Wichita, Kan., has left a broad array of anti-abortion forces without a clear point of focus.

headline.main: Closed Clinic Leaves Abortion Protesters at a Loss
headline.print_headline: In Wichita, a Shuttered Clinic Leaves Abortion Protesters at a Loss

docs.snippet: The shooting of a doctor in Wichita, Kan., has left a broad array of anti-abortion forces without a clear point of focus.
